channel.title: Agones on Sreenath Premkumar
channel.description: Recent content in Agones on Sreenath Premkumar

item.title: Connected Games #1 - Research
item.description: This is a post in a series of devlogs I’ll be doing for a Multiplayer Game project I’m working on as part of my Master’s Program at Kingston University. In this post, we’ll cover some initial planning done towards implementing a Dedicated Server Architecture using Unreal Engine and Agones for Server Orchestration.
